renal_yes: Rise in serum creatinine >30% or fall in creatinine clearance >25%

suggestive_bloods_or_urine: Blood/urine tests are not suggestive of relapse
suggestive_imaging: Imaging is not suggestive of relapse
ent_yes: Bloody nasal discharge / crusts / ulcers / granulomata

general_findings: Tissue fibrosis (eg liver or lung fibrosis)
Consistent with vasculitis but not definite
Culture of microorganism from biopsy specimen
organ_specific_findings: Extravascular non granulomatous acute or chronic inflammation
size_of_vessel_involved: Medium artery (main visceral arteries eg renal
vessel_specific_findings: Vascular scarring consistent with vasculitis but no active inflammation
Fragmentation of the internal elastic lamina
Perivascular inflammation only without vessel wall involvement in a specimen
Immune complex deposits in vessels other than glomeruli with prominent IgA
Immune complex deposits in vessels other than glomeruli without prominent IgA
Absence or paucity of immune complex deposits in vessels other than glomeruli
